problem.markdown:
>>What is the difference between git and github <<
( ) They are both the same implementation for the standard () Git is a system to control code versioning and github is website (x) Git is a tool to manage source code, while GitHub is a service that hosts git repositories

multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is the difference between git and github

choicegroup.choice: They are both the same implementation for the standard
Git is a system to control code versioning and github is website
Git is a tool to manage source code, while GitHub is a service that hosts git repositories
